SELECT count(*) FROM dayaver where lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng} and inputdate BETWEEN sysdate - '6' and sysdate
select trunc(count(*)/2,1) from dayaver where lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng} and inputdate between sysdate - '1' and sysdate
select trunc(count(*)/2,1) from dayaver where lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng} and inputdate between sysdate - '3' and sysdate - '2'
select toiletnm, inputdate from (select * from dayaver order by inputdate desc)dayaver where rownum < 4 and id = #{id}
SELECT toiletNm FROM dayaver where id = #{id} GROUP by toiletNm ORDER BY COUNT(toiletNm) DESC
SELECT count(toiletNm) FROM dayaver where id = #{id} GROUP by toiletNm ORDER BY COUNT(toiletNm) DESC
